acerca-de-mi.description:
I am a 32 year old Full Stack Web Developer. I have worked on projects where I have applied my knowledge to create attractive and responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

My experience includes the use of libraries and frameworks such as React to develop web applications. On the backend, I specialize in Node.js, where I have developed APIs and complete web applications, integrating databases and applying business logic.

I make sure to implement the best security practices to ensure the integrity of the applications. Currently, I am studying a University Degree in Programming at the National Technological University, which allows me to continue expanding my skills and knowledge in the field of technology.

contacto.form-seccion: If you want to leave me a message...
contacto.name: Name
contacto.contact-description: Type here... When you press send, a confirmation window will open, click on: 'I am not a robot' to confirm sending the message.
